conversations.content:
I'll be arriving in London on March 15th. Last year, I stayed at the 'London Luxury Hotel', which had amazing reviews and ratings. It was super quiet and clean, and my room had a view of the Thames River. It was such a great experience! This time, I want to try out a new hotel. Once I figure out which one is the best, I'll head there and then find a good restaurant to eat at with my friends.
I have a budget of 160 for the hotel, and I want to stay in a hotel with the highest rating. Can you recommend a hotel? Tell me the name, rating, price range, and address. Thanks a bunch!

<function_thought>
To fulfill the user's request, the first step is to retrieve all hotels in London to identify options within the specified budget. After that, I can obtain prices and ratings for these hotels, followed by their addresses. I will execute the first function to get all available hotels in London.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_hotels_in_city(city="London")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

Hotel Names: Cozy Stay
Mom's Home
London Luxury
Covent Garden Retreat
Riverside View

<function_thought>
I have retrieved the list of hotels available in London: "Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat", and "Riverside View". The next step is to check the prices for these hotels to find the one that fits the user's budget of 160. I will now call the function to get prices for these hotels.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_hotels_prices(hotel_names=["Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat", "Riverside View"])]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

Considering the user's budget of 160, the hotels that fit within this budget are "Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", and "Covent Garden Retreat". The next step is to retrieve the ratings and reviews for these hotels to determine which one has the highest rating.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_rating_reviews_for_hotels(hotel_names=["Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat"])]</function_call>
